entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He is described as looking coldly surprised and sneering at Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character who is being questioned by Voldemort. He is described as standing up to Voldemort and not wanting to give him a job.

relationships.description: Voldemort asks Dumbledore for a job, but Dumbledore refuses. This is described as Voldemort's final attempt to get what he wants from Dumbledore.
